fr.liglab.adele.icasa.location
Interface LocatedDevice

All Superinterfaces:
LocatedObject
public interface LocatedDevice
extends LocatedObject

This device interface is used to add properties not specified in the device implementation. The location is also added by this interface. Implementations have to maintain a reference to the Device implementation.

Author:
Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira

Determines if a property has been set.

Parameters:
